====================================
MAP 1: Germany and the UK (programming_assignment1_input1.txt)
====================================
CASE 1: python3 find_route.py programming_assignment1_input1.txt Duesseldorf Hannover

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 435 km
route:
Duesseldorf to Dortmund, 69 km
Dortmund to Bremen, 234 km
Bremen to Hannover, 132 km

CASE 2: python3 find_route.py programming_assignment1_input1.txt Saarbruecken Leipzig

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 662 km
route:
Saarbruecken to Frankfurt, 177 km
Frankfurt to Nuremberg, 222 km
Nuremberg to Leipzig, 263 km

CASE 3: python3 find_route.py programming_assignment1_input1.txt Bristol Berlin

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: infinity
route:
none

CASE 4: python3 find_route.py programming_assignment1_input1.txt Kassel Kassel

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 0 km
route:
Kassel to Kassel, 0 km

CASE 5: python3 find_route.py programming_assignment1_input1.txt Munich Luebeck

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 923 km
route:
Munich to Nuremberg, 171 km
Nuremberg to Leipzig, 263 km
Leipzig to Madgeburg, 125 km
Madgeburg to Hannover, 148 km
Hannover to Hamburg, 153 km
Hamburg to Luebeck63 63 km

====================================
MAP 2: Colorado and Florida (colorado_florida_map_2.txt)
====================================
CASE 1: python3 find_route.py colorado_florida_map_2.txt Winter_Park Colorado_Springs

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 80 km
route:
Winter_Park to Golden, 35 km
Golden to Denver, 10 km
Denver to Aurora, 10 km
Aurora to Colorado_Springs, 25 km

CASE 2: python3 find_route.py colorado_florida_map_2.txt Commerce_City Estes_Park

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 55 km
route:
Commerce_City to Broomfield, 10 km
Broomfield to Longmont, 20 km
Longmont to Estes_Park, 25 km

CASE 3: python3 find_route.py colorado_florida_map_2.txt Daytona Jacksonville

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 105 km
route:
Daytona to Cocoa_Beach, 45 km
Cocoa_Beach to Orlando, 40 km
Orlando to Jacksonville, 20 km

CASE 4: python3 find_route.py colorado_florida_map_2.txt Tampa Denver

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: infinity
route:
none

CASE 5: python3 find_route.py colorado_florida_map_2.txt Cocoa_Beach Cocoa_Beach

EXPECTED OUTPUT
distance: 0 km
route:
Cocoa_Beach to Cocoa_Beach, 0 km
